loans.name: Afepeb 06 Group

texts.fr: AFEPEB 06 est un groupe constitué de trois personnes et dont le représentant (celui qui a la main levée sur la photo) est nommé Germain. Les membres du groupe habitent dans le même quartier. Dans le but d’augmenter leur fonds de roulement, ce groupe sollicite pour la troisième fois, un crédit auprès de ALIDé. Germain est âgé de 54 ans et est marié à Félicité. Le couple a trois enfants, tous scolarisés et à leur charge. La famille vit ensemble. Le couple assure ensemble les diverses charges familiales. Germain a arrêté l'école au cours secondaire. Pour subvenir à ses besoins et assurer les besoins de ses enfants, Germain achète de l'huile de palme qu'il vend à son domicile. Germain s'approvisionne au Bénin. Ce troisième prêt permettra certainement à Germain et aux autres membres du groupe AFEPEB 06 de rehausser le niveau de leur activité et d’accroître leur clientèle et leur revenu. Les deux premiers prêts ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en:
AFEPEB 06 Group is made up of three persons. Its representative is named Germain, and is the one raising his hand in the photograph. The members of the group live in the same neighborhood. In order to increase its working capital, this group is seeking a third loan from Kiva's partner, ALIDé. 

Germain is 54 years old and married to Félicité. The couple has three school-attending children, whom they have to support. The family lives together, and the couple takes care of the various household expenses together.

Germain dropped out of middle school. In order to provide for himself and his children, he buys palm oil that he resells at his home. He gets his supplies in Benin.

This third loan will certainly enable Germain and the other members of the group to bolster their business and increase their clientele and income. The previous two loans were repaid without problems.

loans.use: to buy cans of palm oil

loans.name: Bertha

texts.es: Bertha tiene 40 años, esta casada con Paulino de 42 años y fruto de esa relación tienen 05 hijos que se encuentran en etapa escolar. Juntos residen en su propia casa donde reina la comprensión y el apoyo mutuo entre si. Ella proviene de una familia que por tradición se han dedicado a la agricultura, pero hace 15 años cuenta con su propia parcela de 03 hectáreas, ahí cultiva café y cacao, siendo éste último, que mayor demanda tiene en el mercado. La clave de su éxito radica en la creatividad y las ganas de trabajar, pues sus plantas están cultivadas bajo las técnicas agrícolas que aplicó Bertha y esto es gracias a las enseñanzas que le dieron los Ingenieros Agrónomos. Su esposo es quien más lo apoya en este trabajo, sin embargo cuando es temporada de  cosecha necesariamente debe contratar jornaleros, de esa manera pueda terminar a tiempo la extracción y selección de su producto. Su plan a futuro es seguir ampliando su producción, así logrará cumplir con la demanda de sus clientes. Este es su cuarto crédito con MFP y espera contar una vez más con el apoyo de todos ustedes para concretar sus planes, por lo cual él esta apto en cumplir puntualmente sus cuotas. Con los 1,000 soles que solicita, contratará jornaleros para que lo apoyen en la cosecha y sacar la maleza de entre sus plantas.
texts.en:
Bertha, 40, is married to Paulino, 42, and they have five children in school.  They all live in their own house, a home filled with mutual understanding and support.  She comes from a family that has traditionally worked in agriculture and 15 years ago she received her own land of 3 hectares.

There she grows coffee and cacao, the latter with the higher market value.  The key to her success lies in her creativity and desire to work.  Her plants grow with the agricultural techniques that Bertha was taught by agricultural engineers.
Her husband helps her in this work but they still need to hire farm workers seasonally so that they can harvest all and select their products.
Her future plan is to continue expanding her production so that she can fill her customers requests.
This is her fourth loan with MFP and she hopes to receive one more loan with the help of all of you to finish her plans.  Because of this she is punctual in her payments.  She will use the 1000 sols to hire farmworkers for help during the harvest and to pull the weeds among the crops.

loans.use: to hire farm workers

loans.name: Grâce Divine Group

texts.fr: Le groupe GRÂCE DIVINE est composé de trois personnes qui sont des amies. C'est la troisième fois que ce groupe sollicite l'aide financier de ALIDé, afin d'élever le niveau de leur activité. La représentante du groupe, du nom de Prudencia est celle qui a la main levée sur la photo. Prudencia est âgée de 35 ans et est mariée à un informaticien du nom de Thomas. Le couple a un enfant qui est scolarisé et qui vit avec eux. Prudencia assure ensemble avec son mari les diverses charges de la maison. Prudencia a arrêté l'école au cours primaire. Depuis une dizaine d'année, Prudencia vend des tissus et des feuilles de bissap par le système de distribution. Prudencia s'approvisionne au Bénin. Dans la quête de la satisfaction de sa clientèle et pour accroître son chiffre d’affaire et son revenu, Prudencia sollicite, ensemble avec les autres membres du groupe GRÂCE DIVINE, un troisième crédit. Les deux premiers prêts ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en:
GRÂCE DIVINE Group is made up of three friends. For the third time, this group is seeking financial help from Kiva's partner, ALIDé, in order to bolster their businesses.

The group's representative is named Prudencia, and is the one raising her hand in the photograph. She's 35 years old, and married to a computer specialist named Thomas. The couple has one school-attending child who lives with them. Prudencia and her husband take care of the various household expenses together.

Prudencia dropped out of elementary school. For approximately ten years, she's been selling fabrics and hibiscus leaves through the distribution system. She gets her supplies in Benin. Eager to meet customer demand and increase her revenue and income, she's seeking a third loan, together with the other member of the group. The previous two loans were repaid without problems.

loans.use: to buy fabrics and hibiscus leaves

loans.name: Filomena

texts.es:
Filomena  es socia del  Banco Comunal “Central Vaquería”, ubicado en el distrito de Ilave, provincia El Collao, departamento de Puno, tiene 42 años de edad, está casada y tiene 5 hijos.  Estudió sólo hasta 1ro de educación secundaria.
La señora se dedica  a la venta de carne, desde hace un ciclo trabaja con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos, su primer préstamo fue por las suma de S/. 500.00 nuevo soles, dinero que invirtió en la compra de cuatro animales menores.
Con éste nuevo préstamo de S/. 1,500.00 nuevo soles, comprará ocho animales, ella los compra en las ferias de Juli, Zepita, Camicachi, luego los carnea  y vende la carne en el mercado de Ilave.  En el negocio le ayudan sus hijos y su esposo quien también trabaja en la agricultura.
La señora desea crecer en el negocio y mejorar sus ingresos.
Lo que le gusta del Banco Comunal es la facilidad del préstamo, el ahorro y su ganancia
texts.en:
Filomena is a member of Central Vaquería Communal Bank, located in the district of Ilave, province of El Collao, department of Puno.  She is 42 years old and married with five children.  She reached only the first year of her secondary education.

Filomena sells meat.  She has worked with the Movimiento Manuela Ramos organization for one loan cycle.  Her first loan was for the sum of 500 PEN, which she invested in purchasing four small animals.

With this new loan of 1,500 PEN she will buy eight animals.  She buys them in the markets in Juli, Zepita, and Camicachi, then butchers them and sells the meat in the market in Ilave.  Her children and her husband help her in the business.  Her husband also works in agriculture.

Filomena hopes to grow in the business and improve her income.

What she likes about the communal bank is the convenience of the loan, the savings, and her profits.

loans.use: to buy eight animals.

loans.name: Ana Beatriz

texts.es: Ana Beatriz de 27 años de edad se ha dedicado a vender ropa para dama desde hace dos años pero solo con su capital propio hace tres años ella perdió a sus padres y desde entonces aprendió a ser independiente y ha seguir adelante y es la que atiende a sus hermanos ya que ninguno de ellos esta casado con lo que ella gana logra vestirse y su anhelo es crecer su negocio y seguir el ejemplo de muchas personas que han logrado salir adelante ella esta solicitando este credito para la compra de ropa en diferentes estilos y tamaños.
texts.en: Ana Beatriz is 27 years old and has been selling women’s clothing for two years with her own capital. Three years ago she lost her parents and since then learned to be independent and to press on. She takes care of her brothers since none of them are married. With her earnings she can clothe herself. Her dream is to grow her business and follow the example of the many people have been successful. She is asking for this loan to buy clothes in different styles and sizes.

loans.use: to buy clothes in different styles and sizes.

loans.name: Dagbegnon (Djidje) Group

texts.fr: Le groupe DAGBEGNON (DJIDJE) est composé de trois personnes qui sont dans la même confession religieuse. C'est la première fois que ce groupe sollicite l'aide financier de ALIDé, afin d'élever le niveau de leur activité. La représentante du groupe, du nom de Afiavi Pauline est celle qui a la main levée sur la photo. Afiavi Pauline est âgée de 41 ans et est mariée à un frigoriste du nom de Lucien. Le couple a deux enfants, tous scolarisés et à leur charge. La famille vit ensemble et le couple se partage les diverses charges de la maison. Afiavi Pauline n'a pas fréquenté l'école. Afin de s’impliquer activement dans les charges du ménage, Afiavi Pauline prépare de la nourriture (pâte de maïs accompagné de sauce), qu'elle vend dans une ville du Bénin. Afiavi Pauline s'approvisionne au Bénin et exerce cette activité depuis dix sept ans environs. Dans la quête de la satisfaction de sa clientèle et pour accroître son chiffre d’affaire et son revenu, Afiavi Pauline sollicite, ensemble avec les autres membres du groupe DAGBEGNON (DJIDJE), un premier crédit.
texts.en: The DAGBEGNON (DJIDJE) group is made up of three people who are of the same religion. This is the first time that the group requests financial help from ALIDé, in order to enhance the level of their activity. The leader of the group, by the name of Afiavi Pauline is the one with her hand raised in the photo. Afiavi Pauline is 41 years old and is married to a fridge technician called Lucien. They have two children, both attend school and are dependent. The family lives together and the couple share the different family expenses. Afiavi Pauline did not go to school. In order to participate actively in the household costs, Afiavi Pauline prepares food (corn cakes with sauce) that she sells in a town in Benin. Afiavi Pauline buys her stock in Benin and has been in this business for about seven years. In order to satisfy her customers and increase her sales and her income, Afiavi Pauline requests a first loan with the other members of the DAGBEGNON (DJIDJE) group.

loans.use: purchase sauce seasoning and corn.

loans.name: Wilmer Antonio

texts.es: Wilmer de 26 años de edad es casado, tiene 3 hijos, los cuales estudian, la mayor la secundaria, el segundo primaria y el pequeñito de 2 añitos. Labora como Policia Municipal desde hace casi 2 años. Esta solicitando su 3er  credito con el objetivo de mejorar su vivienda realizando la construccion de un cuarto y asi brindarle a su familia mejores comodidades, con los creditos anteriores logro terminar la cocina en su casa y espera lograr poco a poco brindar mayores condiciones a su familia.
texts.en: 26-year-old Wilmer is married and has three children who are in school.  His eldest child [a daughter] is in primary school, his second child [a son] is in elementary school and his youngest [son] is just 2 years old.  WIlmer has been working for Juigalpa Council for almost two years as a local police officer.  He is requesting his third loan with the aim of improving his home.  He will build a room and thereby provide his family with better living conditions.  Wilmer used his previous loans to finish off his kitchen.  He hopes to gradually provide his family with better living conditions.

loans.use: to build a room

loans.name: Joie Du Christ Group

texts.fr: Le groupe JOIE DU CHRIST est formé de trois personnes qui vivent dans le même quartier au Bénin. La représentante de ce groupe, nommée Adjobignon Colette, est celle dont la main est levée sur la photo. Adjobignon Colette est âgée de 33 ans et est mariée à un agent commercial du nom de Oscar. Le couple a quatre enfants à charge, tous à leur charge. Parmi les enfants, certains sont scolarisés. Adjobignon Colette vit ensemble avec sa famille. Le couple assure ensemble les diverses charges familiales. Adjobignon Colette a arrêté très tôt l’école. Pour subvenir à ses besoins et assurer ses différentes charges, Adjobignon Colette vend de la friperie dans un marché du Bénin. Adjobignon Colette achète ses produits au Bénin. Adjobignon Colette exerce cette activité depuis dix huit ans. C’est la deuxième fois que Adjobignon Colette et les autres membres du groupe JOIE DU CHRIST sollicitent un crédit auprès de ALIDé. Ce crédit leur servira à renforcer leur activité afin de mieux répondre à la demande de leur clientèle.
texts.en:
The "Joie du Christ" group is made of three people who live in the same neighborhood in Benin. The group's representative, Adjobignon Colette, has her hand raised in the photo. She is 33 years old and is married to a commercial agent called Oscar. They have 4 children are responsible for all of them. Some of the children have received education.

Adjobignon Colette lives with her family. Together, the couple take care of the various household expenses. Adjobignon Colette left school at an early age. To take care of her needs and to meet her expenses, she sells second-hand clothing at a market in Benin. She purchases the clothing in Benin, and has been involved in this activity for 8 years. This is the second time that Adjobignon Colette and the other members of "Joie du Christ" have asked for a loan from ALIDé. The loan will help them increase their business in order to better meet customer demand.

loans.use: to buy used clothing.

loans.name: Duo Solidario La Cumbre Group

texts.es:
DUO LA CUMBRE
Este dúo está formado por don Francisco de 55 años de edad casado, tiene 5 hijos que ya están grandes y casados,el es el lider de este duo vende churrascos en su casa desde hace mas de 25 años,  y también tiene una mini tienda, y esta solicitando este credito para la compra de mas productos comestibles para surtir mas su tienda, también esta doña María Estefana de 45 años de edad y tiene 3 hijos, casada, y se dedica a la venta de tortilla desde hace 15 años y está solicitando este crédito porque necesita comprar maíz, y leña que necesita para hacer las tortillas y venderlas, ya que comprando bastante le sale a buen precio y así puede obtener ganancias, ella ha sido socia de fape anteriormente y ahora solicita este nuevo crédito mensual esperando no quedar mal y seguir trabajando para superarse y apoyar a su familia.
texts.en:
DUO LA CUMBRE: This partnership was formed by Francisco who is 55 years old and married. He has five children who are grown and married. He is the leader of this partnership. He has been selling barbequed steak in his home for 25 years. He also has a mini-market. He is asking for this loan to buy more foodstuffs to stock his store. 

Also, there is María Estefana who is 45 years old, married, and has three children. She has been selling tortillas for 15 years. She is asking for this loan because she needs to buy corn and wood, which she needs to make and sell tortillas, since by buying a lot she gets a good price and can make more money.  She has been a borrower with FAPE previously and now she asks for this new loan, each month hoping to be successful and continue working to benefit and support her family.

loans.use: to buy foodstuffs

loans.name: Emilia

texts.es: Emilia tiene 43 años, es natural de la ciudad de Santa Rosa, es casada y madre de 02 hijos, quienes son el motivo para seguir trabajando arduamente. Juntos habitan en su casa que es propia. Durante más de 20 años ha continuado con la agricultura, actividad que su familia ha ejercido por años. Sin embargo no le era suficiente para sostener su hogar, por ello se vio obligada a montar una tienda, gracias a unos ahorros que tuvo. Desde entonces abre las puertas de su tienda a primera hora del día, ofreciendo variedad de productos de primera necesidad. La amabilidad con que atiende a su clientela le ha dado mucha ventaja en sus ventas. Tiene 10 años en esta actividad y  menciona que continuará trabajando con ahínco para consolidar su negocio. Considera además que gracias a las ganancias, ha logrado comprar más terreno agrícolas y del que ahora su esposo trabaja en ella. Con el tiempo, espera poder ampliar su vivienda y su tienda. Por tal motivo pide su 15avo crédito en MFP y esta muy contenta de saber que contara una vez más con el apoyo de todos ustedes. Con el dinero que solicita, comprará productos, como: sacos de arroz, azúcar, aceites, detergentes.
texts.en: Emilia is 43 years old, originally from the city of Santa Rosa, married, and the mother of two children who are her motivation to continue working diligently. Together they live their own house. For more than 20 years she has been working in agriculture, a business her family had engaged in for years. Without a doubt, it is not enough to support the household. For this reason she had to open a store using the savings she had. Since then she opens the doors to her store first thing in the morning, offering a variety of essential products. The friendliness with which she greets her customers has been a great boon to her sales. She has been in this business for 10 years and she says that she will continue working hard to build up her business. Furthermore she says that, thanks to her income, she has been able to buy more farm land and that now her husband works with her. In time, she hopes to be able to expand her home and her business. For that reason she asks for her 15th loan with MFP and she is very happy to know that she can once again count on your help. With the money she asks for, she will buy products like: bags of rice, sugar, oils, and detergents.

loans.use: to buy bags of rice, sugar, oil, and detergent

loans.name: Claudio

texts.es:
El Señor Claudio es casado, tiene 49 años de edad, vive en la ciudad de Pilar, tiene casa propia, donde posee todo lo básico para desarrollar sus actividades dentro del seno familiar y movilidad propia (moto).
Él se dedica a la venta de recuerdos hechos en cuero, cintos y otros . Desarrolla esta actividad hace como 6 años, posee la infraestructura necesaria para el desarrollo de esta actividad y su local es muy reconocido ya que esta situado en el centro mismo de la ciudad.
El solicita el crédito para la compra de cuero, que es su insumo primordial, ya que tiene muchos pedidos de sus clientes con los que le gustaría poder cumplir. Agradece a la Fundación por la oportunidad que le da, pues de obtener el crédito le será de mucha ayuda.
texts.en:
Claudio is married, 49 years old, and lives in the city of Pilar in his own home. There he has all the essentials to run his business and within the family as well as his own transportation (moto). 

He sells souvenirs made of leather, belts, and other products. He has been in this business for about six years. He has the necessary set-up to run this business and his neighborhood is very well-known since it is situated in the center of the city. 

He is asking for a loan to buy leather which is his main material since he has several client orders which he would like to be able to fill. He thanks the Fundación

loans.use: to buy leather to make souvenirs and belts.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buying laying hens

loans.name: Solidario Las Marias Group

texts.es:
SOLIDARIO LAS MARIAS
Las  integrantes de este grupo son mujeres negociantes casadas, ellas se dedican a la venta de ropa típica, doña Angélica Maria, líder de este grupo quien tiene en su domicilio taller de bordados en maquina industrial, produciendo así la elaboración de blusas, delantales, por mayor en diversos diseños y colores,  por lo que es la proveedora de la mercadería a doña María Vicenta y María Estela  quienes venden de manera ambulante en las aldeas de la localidad, doña Angélica fue de la idea de solicitar  un crédito para ayudar a sus compañeras en el negocios, por su parte ella esta solicitando este credito para la compra de telas para la elavoracion de delantales y blusas cada una tiene diversas metas y sueños laborales y familiares.
texts.en:
The members of this group are married businesswomen. They sell traditional clothing.

Doña Angélica Maria, the leader of the group, has an embroidery workshop in her home and works with an industrial machine. She produces large quantities of blouses and aprons in different designs and colors, thereby making her a supplier of these goods.

Doña María Vicenta and María Estela are street merchants who sell in the neighborhoods of their town.

Doña Angélica came up with the idea of requesting a loan in order to help her fellow group members with their businesses. For her part, Angélica is requesting a loan to buy fabrics for making aprons and blouses. Each day she has different goals and dreams for her work and her family.

loans.use: to buy fabrics for making aprons and blouses.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy six lambs.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy milk, bread, eggs, oil, candy, etc.

loans.name: Vabati Vebasa Group

texts.en:
Joyce is 43 years old and lives in Gweru. She has three children who are ages 12, 19 and 21. Two of her children are attending school and she looks after 5 dependents.

Joyce sells peanut butter, pots and plates. She has been in this business for 2 years. Her challenges include late payments by clients and shortage of funds. The loan of $400 that she is applying for will be used to purchase a peanut butter making machine and ground nuts. With additional income obtained from this business, Joyce will have more disposable income that will enable her to adequately provide for her extended family.

Joyce plans to own a kitchenware shop and produce more peanut butter for sale in the near future.

loans.use: to buy a peanut butter making machine and ground nuts

loans.name: Gloria Catalina

texts.es: Gloria Catalina: D. 25 años D. edad.ella se dedica a la crianza D. animales desD. hace 7 años ella nos cuenta que esta contenta porque sus animales han abundado y le da gracias a Dios por que le a dado la oportunidad D. obtener este negocio con la cual ella ayuda a su familia,y a podido salir adelante ella esta solicitando este credito para la compra D. animales ya que ella los compra pequeños y cuando esta grandes los venD. es asi como ella a prosperado nos cuenta que esta conciente D. que le falta capital para trabajar, el sueño D. ella es tener un corral mas granD. y tener mas animales para tener mejor ganacia.
texts.en: Gloria Catalina: D. 25 años D. edad.ella se dedica a la crianza D. animales desD. hace 7 años ella nos cuenta que esta contenta porque sus animales han abundado y le da gracias a Dios por que le a dado la oportunidad D. obtener este negocio con la cual ella ayuda a su familia,y a podido salir adelante ella esta solicitando este credito para la compra D. animales ya que ella los compra pequeños y cuando esta grandes los venD. es asi como ella a prosperado nos cuenta que esta conciente D. que le falta capital para trabajar, el sueño D. ella es tener un corral mas granD. y tener mas animales para tener mejor ganacia.

loans.use: Compra de animales para la venta.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy mobile wind chimes.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy new tires, reupholster the seats of his vehicle, and pay for repairs to his taxi.

loans.name: Duo Peña De Oro Group

texts.es: Duo Peña de Oro. este grupo esta conformado por Vivian Isabel de 36 años de edad casada y tiene dos hijos ella se dedica a la venta de tortillas siendo ella la lider de este grupo y esta solicitando este credito para la compra de maiz para la elavoracion de tortillas,al igual que la siguiente socia ella se dedica a la venta de tortillas y esta solicitnaod este credito para la compra de maiz par la elavoracion de tortillas el sueño de ellas es darles lo mejor a sus hijos darles estudios para que en el futuro sean uno profecionales.
texts.en: Duo Peña de Oro. este grupo esta conformado por Vivian Isabel de 36 años de edad casada y tiene dos hijos ella se dedica a la venta de tortillas siendo ella la lider de este grupo y esta solicitando este credito para la compra de maiz para la elavoracion de tortillas,al igual que la siguiente socia ella se dedica a la venta de tortillas y esta solicitnaod este credito para la compra de maiz par la elavoracion de tortillas el sueño de ellas es darles lo mejor a sus hijos darles estudios para que en el futuro sean uno profecionales.

loans.use: Compra de maiz para la elavoracion de tortillas para la venta.

loans.name: Step By Step Group

texts.en:
Calvin is 35 years old and married. He lives in Gweru with his wife and child, who is age 4. He also looks after 1 dependent. 

Calvin sells chickens and beef. He has been in this business for 2 years. His main challenges are lack of funds and infrastructure, which is big enough to keep a thousand chicks.

He has requested a loan of $400 to buy chicken feed. Additional income will enable him to build a bigger chicken run. In the future, he plans to have 6 chicken runs.

loans.use: To buy chicken feed

loans.name: Indira

texts.es:
La sra. Indira cuenta con 37 años de edad ella esta viviendo en union libre con su pareja tiene dos hijos los cuales depende de ellos el mayor estudia la secundaria y el menor esta en preescolar, su esposo se llama Oscar trabaja de repartidor de agua, ella tiene un negocio de hamburguesas, tortas y refrescos su prestamo lo invirtio en la compra de los insumos que utiliza para la elaboracion de la comida como son: pan, aceite, mayonesa, jitomate, etc. 
Ella tiene una meta de hacer crecer su negocio ampliar un local mas grande para establecer una fonda ya que piensa que le traira muchos beneficios y asi podra ayudar a su familia y tener mas ganancias, ella esta agradecida por que el préstamo le será de gran utilidad.
texts.en:
Indira, 37, lives with her partner and they have 2 dependent children. The oldest is in high school and the youngest is in preschool. Her husband, Oscar, works as a water deliveryman. She has a business selling hamburgers, sandwiches and sodas. She will invest the loan in ingredients to make the food such as bread, oil, mayonnaise, tomato, etc.

Her goal is to grow her business and have a larger space to establish a restaurant because she thinks it will be beneficial and will help her family to have more income. She is grateful for the loan which will be very useful.

loans.use: to buy ingredients to make hamburgers and sandwiches.

loans.name: Elidonia

texts.es:
La Sra. Elidonia cuenta con 55 años de edad es casada tiene una hija a cargo la cual se encuentra cursando la secundaria se llama Yajaira, su esposo se llama Constantino, él cual se dedica al campo.

Ella se dedica al comercio tiene una cocina económica ella invirtirá su préstamo en la compra de los insumos que utiliza para la elaboración de su comida como son aceite, chile, jitomate, cecina, pollo, verdura, etc.

A la Sra. Elidonia se gustaría que su negocio creciera mas ya que le gustaría ampliar su local para poner más mesas y así tener más clientes.
texts.en:
Elidonia, 55, is married and has one daughter, Yajaira, who is in high school. Her husband, Constantino, is a farmer.

Elidonia has a small restaurant. She will invest her loan in the purchase of ingredients such as oil, chile, tomato, smoked meat, chicken and vegetables that she will use to make meals. 

Elidonia would like for her business to grow because she would like to have a larger space to put more tables and serve more customers.

loans.use: to buy ingredients to make meals like oil, chile, tomato, cured meat, chicken, vegetables, etc.

loans.name: Johana Patricia

texts.es: Johana Patricia tiene 38 años, su actividad es la venta de ropa y cosméticos. Hace más de 18 años que tiene experiencia en este medio de vida. La mayoría de sus clientes disfrutan de la buena atención que les brinda a sus clientes. Siempre ha sido una mujer trabajadora y luchadora que disfruta de brindarles a sus clientes lo que ellos le solicitan. Es por este motivo que solicita este crédito para la compra de pantalones, camisas, faldas, ropa interior, cremas, tratamientos, shampoo, entre otros.
texts.en: Johana Patricia is 38 years old, and her business is selling clothing and cosmetics. She has been doing this for over 18 years. The majority of her clients enjoy the close attention she pays to her customers. She has always been a hard-working and tenacious woman who enjoys giving her customers what they ask for. This is her motivation for asking for a loan to buy pants, blouses, skirts, underwear, lotions, beauty treatments, shampoos, and similar items.

loans.use: to buy pants, blouses, skirts, underwear, lotions, beauty treatments, shampoo, and other items.

loans.name: Ruth Dhely

texts.es:
La Srta. Ruth  cuenta con 19 años es soltera, ella ahora ya no estudia solo tiene  el bachillerato, nos dice que tal vez mas adelante le gustaría estudiar la universidad.

Ella se dedica al comercio compra coco por costal, ella pela el coco, lo corta el coco, y  vende la carne de coco, es un poco cansado por lo cual ella contrata personas para que le ayuden, su préstamo lo invirtirá en comprar varias  de coco.

A ella le gustaría poner un local y así poner el negocio de comprarlo ya listo pára verde y poder hacer entregas grandes y así el ytrabajo no será tan pesaado, por el momento espera administra su negocio muy bien para realizar lo que realmente quiere.
texts.en:
Ruth, 19, is single and has graduated from high school. She says that later she might like to go to university. 

She sells coconut in bags. She peels and cuts the coconut and sells the meat. It can be tiring, so she hires people to help her. She will use the loan to buy coconuts.

She would like to have a store and be in the business of buying them ready to sell so that she can meet larger orders and the work wouldn't be so tiresome. For now she hopes to manage her business well so that she can do what she really wants.

loans.use: to buy several dozen coconuts.

loans.name: Achieve Group

texts.en:
Lindiwe lives in Gweru, the Midlands Province of Zimbabwe. She is 28 years old, married and has a child aged 5 who is attending school. 

Lindiwe is a Crossborder trader and she sells clothes at a flea market. She has been in this business for 2 years. The challenges encountered in her business include strict border controls, high duties and increased competition.

She has requested a loan for $400 to buy ladies' clothes, jeans and shoes from South Africa to sell at her flea market in Gweru. With the additional income she will get, Lindiwe plans to buy a car. In the future, she would like to have her own shop.

loans.use: to buy shoes, ladies clothes and jeans for sale

loans.name: Nicolas

texts.es: Nicolás se dedica a la venta de productos lácteos, tiene más de 18 años de tener este medio de vida. Fue por iniciativa propia que empieza este negocio, la mayoría de sus clientes llegan a su vivienda a comprar sus productos pues es aquí que él tiene su negocio. Él solicita este crédito para la compra de leche, cuajada, queso, leche agria entre otros. El sueña con obtener un camión  que le ayude a repartir sus productos.
texts.en: Nicolás sells dairy products and has been in that business for more than 18 years. He began this business of his own initiative. The majority of his clients come to his house to buy his products and so it’s there that he has his business. He is asking for this loan to buy milk, curd, cheese, sour milk, etc. He dream is to have a truck which could help him distribute his products.

loans.use: to buy milk, curd, cheese, sour milk, etc.

loans.name: El Esfuerzo De Colón Group

texts.es:
Éste Banco comunal se llama “El Esfuerzo de Colón” lo conforman 17 emprendedores quienes se dedican a diferentes rubros, pero los principales son venta de ropa, venta de cosméticos por catalogo, venta de plásticos y venta de mercadería. Todos ellos pertenecientes a la comuna de San Bernardo, ciudad de Santiago. 
Olivia integrante del grupo del Banco comunal quien en la foto se encuentra en primera fila y se encuentra sentada en el tercer puesto de derecha a izquierda, usa su cabello suelto, viste un sweater color negro.
Se dedica a vender ropa de temporada para mujeres, desde hace 4 años. Trabaja en horario flexible desde su casa, ya que su madre tiene un almacén y aprovecha esta instancia para ofrecer sus productos a los mismos clientes.
Su clientela es fija y vende puerta a puerta cuando ellas son conocidas. 
Su mercadería la compra en la comuna de Estación Central, en los locales donde los precios sean convenientes para invertir. 
Con el crédito comprará ropa, específicamente calcetines, sweater, poleras para mujeres.
Sus metas son tener un local establecido, en el cual pueda ofrecer y vender su mercadería. 
Olivia vive junto a su madre, su marido y sus dos hijos de 7 años y una pequeña de 9 meses de edad. Sus sueños a nivel personal son invertir en su negocio para generar mayores ganancias, de ésta manera brindarle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida, además anhela comprar un auto para el traslado de su mercadería. En el ámbito familiar Olivia anhela costear los estudios superiores de sus hijos para que sean futuros profesionales. 
Ella está muy contenta y agradecida de los servicios brindados por Fondo Esperanza, el crédito por su parte le permitirá invertir en su negocio.
Respecto a las reuniones impartidas con el Banco comunal, le ha permitido conocer a su grupo y de ésta manera sentirse con mayor comodidad. 
San Bernardo es una ciudad, ubicada  a 18 km. en línea recta hacia el sur desde la plaza de armas de Santiago (capital de Chile). Es conocida como la capital del folklore, debido a que cada año, en  enero, se realiza el "Festival Internacional del Folklore", un evento en el que las raíces del país se dan cita y se reúnen  agrupaciones musicales de toda Sudamérica. También se desarrolla la "Feria de Artesanía Tradicional", en la que participan tanto artesanos chilenos como de otros países cercanos. Luego en abril se realiza el  evento “Abril cuecas Mil” que consiste en hacer bailar cueca (baile tradicional chileno) a toda la comuna.
texts.en:
The communal bank “El Esfuerzo de Colón” has 17 members who have a variety of businesses.  The main ones are: the sale of clothing, cosmetics, plastic items and general merchandise.  They all live in the township of San Bernardino in the city of Santiago.

Olivia is a member of the communal bank who is found in the photo in the second row, seated in the third spot from the right or left; her hair is down and she is wearing a black sweater. She has had a business selling seasonal women's clothing for 4 years.  She works from her house on a flexible schedule.  Her mother has a store, and she takes advantage of this to offer her products to the same customers.  She has a regular customer base, and she sells door-to-door to the customers that she knows.

She purchases her merchandise in the township of  Estación Central, from the places that offer good prices for her investment.  With this loan, she will buy clothing, specifically: socks, sweaters and T-shirts for women.  Her goal is to have an established shop, where she could offer and sell her merchandise.

Olivia lives with her mother, her husband, and their two offspring: a child of 7 and a 9 month-old baby.  At the personal level, she dreams of investing in her business to generate greater earnings so that she can provide her family with a better quality of life.  In addition, she wants to buy an automobile to transport her merchandise.  She also wants to pay for a college education for her children so that in the future they can become professionals.  Olivia is very content and grateful for the services provided by Fondo Esperanza.  She will invest her part of the loan in her business.  With respect to the meetings of her communal bank, they have allowed her to get to know her group and in this way feel more comfortable.  

San Bernardo is a city located 18 km. in a straight line south from the main square of Santiago (the capital of Chile).   It is known as the Capital of Folklore, because every year in January they hold the "International Festival of Folklore," an event in which the roots of the country come together and musical groups from all of South America participate.  The "Traditional Crafts Fair" takes place there as well,  where artisans from Chile and nearby countries participate.  Later in April they host the event "April 1,000 Cuecas," when the whole community dances the cueca dance (a traditional Chilean dance.)

loans.use: to buy clothing, specifically socks, sweaters and T-shirts for women

loans.name: Valentina

texts.en:
Valentina has a small grocery sales business that she operates from a space under a covered pavilion in the busy city market in Kahovka, Ukraine. Valentina is a very experienced market vendor, having been in business over ten years. She works many long hours in a week to make a good income. Her profit for a typical month is about 2,500 Gryvnas, a valuable source of income for her and her husband Alexander. 

Valentina would like to continue the success of her business and has requested a loan of 12,000 Gryvnas to help purchase food inventory to sell. Valentine appreciates the opportunity to receive financial assistance that will help her to make a better life for her family.

loans.use: to purchase food inventory for sale

loans.name: Dina Margarita

texts.es:
Dina  es socia del  Banco Comunal “Central Vaquería”, ubicado en el  distrito de Ilave, provincia El Collao, departamento de Puno, tiene 29 años de edad, es conviviente y tiene 1 hijo.  Cuenta con educación superior.
Dina trabaja desde hace un año con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos, su primer préstamo  fue por la suma de S/. 500.00 nuevo soles dinero que invirtió en su negocio, ella se dedica a la crianza de animales y venta de carne.
Con este nuevo préstamo de S/. 2,300.00 nuevo soles, comprará diez animales.  Nos cuenta que los compra en las ferias y los carnea, esta carne la vende en la ciudad de Arequipa, Puno, e Ilave.  En el negocio trabaja junto con su esposo.
La señora desea tener una casa y un carro para su negocio.
Lo que le gusta del Banco Comunal  son las capacitaciones, el ahorro y sus utilidades.
texts.en:
Dina is a member of the Central Vaquería Communal Bank, located in the district of Ilave, province of El Collao, department of Puno.  She is 29 years old, lives with her partner, and has one child.  She studied at the college level.

Dina has been working with the Movimiento Manuela Ramos organization for a year.  Her first loan was for the sum of 500 PEN, which she invested in her business.  She raises animals and sells meat.

She will buy ten animals with this new loan of 2,300 PEN.  She tells us that she buys them in the markets and butchers them.  She sells the meat in the city of Arequipa, in Puno, and in Ilave.  Her husband works with her in the business.

Dina wants to have a house and a car for her business.

What she likes about the communal bank is the training, the savings, and the profits.

loans.use: to buy ten animals.

loans.name: Candelaria

texts.es:
Candelaria es socia del  Banco Comunal “Central Vaquería”, ubicado en el distrito de Ilave, provincia El Collao, departamento de Puno, tiene 36 años de edad, está casada y tiene 2 hijos.  Estudió la secundaria.
La señora se dedica  a la compra y venta de animales como ovinos, vacunos y porcinos, desde hace un año trabaja con el Movimiento Manuela R., su primer préstamo fue por la suma de S/. 500.00 nuevo soles, dinero que invirtió en la compra de tres unidades de ovinos.
Con este nuevo préstamo de S/.  1,500.00 nuevo soles, comprará ocho unidades de ovinos para su engorde  por tres meses. Los animales lo compran y lo venden en la localidad de Ilave.
 Trabaja junto con su esposo y también se dedican a la chacra.  
La señora desea seguir con el negocio y mejorar sus ventas	
Lo que le gusta del Banco Comunal  es la facilidad del préstamo y el ahorro.
texts.en:
Candelaria is a member of the Central Vaquería Communal Bank.  It is located in the Ilave district, El Collao province, Puno department.  She is 36 years old, married, and has two children and a high school education.

She buys and sells animals like sheep, cows, and pigs. 

She has worked with the Movimiento Manuela R. for one year.  Her first loan was for 500 soles, which she used to buy three sheep.  With this new loan for 1,500 soles she will buy eight sheep to fatten for three months.  

She buys and sells the animals in Ilave.  She works together with her husband, and he also devotes himself to the farm.

She wishes to continue with the business and to improve her sales.  What she likes about her communal bank are the easy loan terms and the savings.

loans.use: to buy eight sheep to fatten.

loans.name: Luz Maria

texts.es:
La señora Luz Maria y su esposo el señor Pascual son padres de familia y tiene tres hijos que están estudiando. 
Solicitan un préstamo para comprar los útiles escolares (libros, cuadernos, plumas, lápices y carpetas) ya que les solicitan este material para poder trabajar en la escuela y que puedan terminar este siclo escolar sin ningún problema.
Espera contar con su cooperación ya que es muy importante para ellos que sus hijos tengan el estudio necesario para su futuro. 
Planean pagar el crédito con una parte del sueldo que recibe Don Pascual de su trabajo en una fábrica en el aria de producción ya que Doña Luz Maria se dedica al cuidado y tensión de la familia.
texts.en:
Señora Luz Maria and her husband, Señor Pascual, are parents of three children who attend school.

They are requesting a loan to buy school supplies (books, notebooks, pens, pencils and folders), as they need these supplies for their children to be able to do their schoolwork and to be able to finish the academic year without any problems.

She hopes to be able to count on your cooperation, as it is very important for them that their children receive the education necessary for their future.

They are planning on paying back the loan with part of the salary that Don Pascual earns from his work in production in a factory, as Doña Luz Maria focuses on taking care of and tending to the family.

loans.use: to buy school supplies.

loans.name: Alberto Jose

texts.es: Alberto José se dedica a una pulpería. Hace más de 21 años que tiene este negocio. Él es una persona muy emprendedora las ganas de salir adelante que obtiene cada día han hecho que Alberto siga adelante con este negocio. Es por eso que solicita este crédito para realizar las comprar variadas de sus productos como leche, huevos, enlatados, sopas, papel higiénico, gaseosas, jugos, pan entre otros.
texts.en:
Alberto José has a general store, and he has had this business for over 21 years.  He is a very enterprising person.  His daily desire to get ahead has made Alberto advance with this business.

That is why he is requesting this loan to buy various products like milk, eggs, canned goods, soup, toilet paper, soft drinks, and bread, among others.

loans.use: to buy various products like milk, eggs, canned goods, soup, toilet paper, soft drinks, and bread, among others.

loans.name: Irina

texts.en:
Irina is an entrepreneur from Novaya Kahovka. She sells women’s clothing items such as jeans and sportswear in one of the city markets. She started this venture with the help of lending assistance in order to get going. She has now been in business for sixteen years. Currently, her turnover is about 30,000 Grivnyas and her monthly net profit is about 6,000 Grivnyas.

Irina loves what she is doing and is looking forward to the future. She is grateful for the opportunity this business has given her, not only to provide for herself, but also to help her family. The current loan of 15,000 Grivnas will help her business be stable this fall season.

loans.use: to purchase seasonal inventories

loans.name: Sara

texts.es:
Doña Sara es una mujer muy trabajadora, luchadora , tiene48 años de edad, casada, vive con su esposo y su hija. La señora se dedica a la costura, también vende por catalogo, es una persona con grandes deseo de superarse, también es una líder comunal del sector de pozos de Santa Ana. La clienta se entero de la Fundación por medio de una reunión que hubo en pozos y le llamo la atención ya que ella tiene una pequeña empresa de costura donde hacen colchas, almohadas, cortinas, etc, pero no tiene como expandirse por falta de capital de trabajo, por su situación económica la señora pudo llegar hasta la primaria.
 Este es su primer crédito en la Fundación, será para capital de trabajo ya que tiene un negocio muy bueno de hacer colchas pero por falta de capital no ha podido cumplir con los pedidos.
  La solicitante tiene un taller de costura en su casa de habitación, es muy amplio y cómodo, lo tiene muy ordenado, desde hace dos años se dedica a coser se capacito en talleres que van a dar a Santa Ana.
La clienta se levanta desde temprano hace sus labores domesticas y luego se va a trabajar en su taller sale a las cuatro ya que su esposo llega a esa hora lo atiende y luego vuelve a trabajar hasta las seis
La clienta Sara piensa invertir en la compra de materia prima como lo que son telas, hilos, etc, tambien piensa invertir en la compra de mercaderia para ayudarse con las ventas de catalogo.
texts.en:
Doña Sara is a very hard-working and striving woman.  She is 48 years old and is married; she lives with her husband and daughter.  The Señora works doing sewing, and she also makes sales from a catalog.  She is a person who has great wishes to succeed, and is also a community leader for the Pozos neighborhood in Santa Ana.

The client joined the Fundación through a meeting which took place in Pozos which came to her attention as she has a small sewing business where she makes quilts, cushions, curtains, etc., but she has not been able to expand as she lacks working capital.  Because of her financial situation, the Señora has only attended school up to primary level.

This is her first loan with the Fundación, and it will be used for working capital as she has a very good business making quilts but has been able to complete her orders due to lack of capital.

The member has a sewing workshop in her home; it is very suitable for her needs and comfortable, and she keeps it well-organized.  She has been sewing  for the last 12 years, and was trained in workshops that were given in Santa Ana.

The client gets up early to take care of her domestic chores, and then goes to work in her workshop.  She stops at four o'clock as her husband comes home at this time, so she tends to him and then returns to work from six o'clock.

loans.use: to invest in merchandise such as clothes, perfume, and shoes, and to buy materials such as cloth and thread.

loans.name: Vilma Sobeida

texts.es:
Vilma Sobeida tiene 56 años, es casada vive con el esposo y los hijos. Tiene 4 hijos de treintaicuatro, treintidos, treinta, veintiocho años de edad.

Los miembros de la V.R.C. SAN JOSE DE LOS AMARILLOS se dedican a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz, arroz y frejol gandúl.

Vilma Sobeida se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, arroz y frejol gandul. 

Solicita el crédito para sembrar maíz y arroz, compra de semillas,insumos, fertilizantes, abonos agrícolas  para los cultivos.   Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades.
Con la ayuda del crédito anterior sembro un poco más de lo maíz, fréjol y pudo vender en un muy buen precio esto le favorecio mucho porque reunio un dinero extra para gastos de la familia.

 Enfrentar desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es poder incrementar el capital y poner un negocio para aumentar las utilidades.

Le gusta hacer deporte y ejercicio.
texts.en:
Vilma Sobeida is 56. She is married and lives with her husband and four children children (ages 34, 32, 30 and 28). 

The members of the San Jose de los Amarillos Communal Bank are farmers who sow short-cycle crops: corn, rice and gandul beans.

Vilma Sobeida works in agriculture, sowing corn, rice, and gandul beans. 

She is requesting this loan for sowing corn and rice, and for buying seeds, supplies, fertilizers, and manure for her crops. Through supporting this loan, you will help her to cover her needs.

With her previous loan, she planted a bit more corn and beans, and was able to sell at a very good price. This helped her greatly because she made some extra money for the family's costs.

She confronts challenges such as plant pests, diseases, and weather variations. Her dream is to be able to increase her capital and open a business to  increase her income.

She enjoys doing sports and exercising.

loans.use: to sow corn and rice; buying seeds, supplies, fertilizers and manure.

loans.name: Martha Janed

texts.es:
En el municipio de Puerto Berrío, situado en el departamento de Antioquia vive Martha Janed, una microempresaria que desde muy pequeña ha trabajado para sacar a su familia adelante, pues a los 16 años ya tenia un hijo por quien responder, y aunque al comienzo contaba con el apoyo de sus esposo, hoy con 4 hijos y a sus 40 años es una mujer separada.  Martha tiene su propio negocio, una tienda de abarrotes que es el sustento para su familia y aunque no son muchos los ingresos que genera, ella se levanta día a día con la ilusión de ver progresar su negocio.

Martha ve la necesidad de surtir la tienda en mayor cantidad, ya que así las utilidades se aumentarán, las ventas mejorarán y proporcionalmente su calidad de vida ira mejorando poco a poco.
texts.en:
In the town of Puerto Berrío, in the Department of Antioquia, lives Martha Janed.  She is a small-businesswoman who has worked since she was very young to be able to move her family ahead in life, as at 16 years old she had a son for whom she was responsible.  Although she had the support of her husband at the beginning, today she has four children and at 40 years old, is separated from him.

Martha has her own business, a grocery store, which is the source of income for her family.  Although the income she earns is not very much, she gets up every morning with the hope of seeing her business progress.

Martha sees the need to stock up her store with more products, as in this way her profits were grow, her sales will improve, and correspondingly her quality of life will improve little by little.

loans.use: to buy merchandise to stock up her store.

loans.name: Ppregmecs Group

texts.en:
Prettymore lives in Masvingo. She is 50 years old and married to a teacher. She has three children aged 27, 24 and 16. Two of her children go to school.  

Prettymore sells clothing and pottery, a business she has been operating for 12 years. She says the main challenge is funding to increase her business. Pretty has requested a loan of $400 to buy clothing and pottery as merchandise. She says the extra income generated will go towards the school fees of her children. Her future business ambition is to open a dry cleaning company in Chiredzi.

loans.use: To buy clothing and pottery for sale

loans.name: Diana Carolina

texts.es:
Diana Carolina  tiene 22 años, Vive en Unión Libre vive con el cónyugue y los hijos en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos. Tiene 2  hijos de tres y cinco años de edad.

Los miembros de la V.R.C. SAN JOSE DE LOS AMARILLOS se encuentra ubicada en el recinto Amarillos, perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz y arroz.

Diana se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz y arroz. Compra sus productos en Comercial Murillo y los vende en la misma localidad.

Solicita el crédito para sembrar maíz, arroz,fréjol y poder comprar semillas, insumos,  fertilizantes, urea, abonos agrícolas  para los cultivos. Con el apoyo del crédito anterior le ha ayudado mucho porque ha podido cosechar producto bueno y lo ha vendido en un buen precio y le sirvio para suplir sus necesidades económicas. 
En eltrato con la familia ha mejorado esta estable.

Diana se enfrenta a muchos desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es tener un negocio propio y que sea rentable.

En los tiempos libres le gusta escuchar música y salir a divertirse.
texts.en:
Diana Carolina, 22, is living with her spouse and two children, ages three and five, in Ventanas Canton, Los Ríos Province. 

The members of the “SAN JOSE DE LOS AMARILLOS” communal bank are located in Amarillos, which belongs to Ventanas Canton.  They are short cycle corn and rice farmers.

Diana farms corn and rice. She buys her products at Comercial Murillo and sells them there as well.

She is requesting the loan to plant corn, rice, and beans.  She will also buy seeds, supplies, urea, and natural and chemical fertilizers for her crops.  Support from the previous loan has helped her a lot because she has been able to harvest a good product and sell it for a good price.  It served to satisfy her financial needs.  In that period of time her family has improved; it is stable.

Diana faces many challenges like pest infestations, illnesses and the variations in the weather. 

Her dream is to have a business of her own, and that it is profitable.

In her free time she enjoys listening to music and going out to have fun.

loans.use: to plant corn, rice, and beans and to buy seeds, supplies, urea, and natural and chemical fertilizers.

loans.name: Antonia

texts.es:
Antonia es socia del  Banco Comunal “Central Vaquería”, ubicado en el  distrito de Ilave, provincia El Collao, departamento de Puno, tiene 35 años de edad, está  casada y tiene 2 hijos.  Ella estudió la secundaria. Su esposo trabaja como taxista (transporte)
La señora se dedica a la compra y venta de animales domésticos como ovinos y vacunos, su primer préstamo fue por la suma de S/. 500.00 nuevo soles dinero que incrementó al capital de su negocio.
Con éste nuevo préstamo de S/. 500.00 nuevo soles comprará  cuatro animales (ovinos), para su engorde por tres meses.  Nos cuenta que los animales los compra de la localidad de Ilave.  En el negocio le ayudan sus hijos. 
La señora desea mejorar los animales y así obtener mejores ingresos.
Lo que le gusta del Banco Comunal  es la facilidad del préstamo y el ahorro.
texts.en:
Antonia is a member of the Central Vaquería Communal Bank, located in the Ilave District of the El Collao Province in the department of Puno.  She is 35 years old, married, and has two children.  She has a secondary education.  Her husband works as a taxi driver (transportation).

Her profession is buying and selling domestic animals, such as sheep and cattle.  Her first loan was for a total of 500 nuevo soles, which increased her business capital.

With this new loan of 500 nuevos soles she will buy four animals (sheep), for three months of fattening.  She tells us that she buys the animals in the town of Ilave.  Her children help her with her business.

She wants to improve the animals and, as a result, receive better income.

What she likes about the communal bank is the ease of lending and the savings.

loans.use: to buy four animals (sheep)

loans.name: Clemencia Victoria

texts.es:
Clemencia Victoria tiene 43 años, Es Viuda vive con los hijos de doce y once  años de edad en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos. 

Los miembros de la V.R.C. SAN JOSE DE LOS AMARILLOS se encuentra ubicada en el recinto Amarillos, perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de  maíz, arroz y fréjol gandúl
Clemencia se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz y arroz. Compra sus productos en Comercial Murillo y los vende en la misma localidad.

Solicita el crédito para sembrar maíz, arroz y fréjol gandúl y comprar insumos, fertilizantes, urea, abonos agrícolas para los cultivos.   Con el apoyo del crédito ha logrado tratar y mantener en buenas condiciones el terreno para poder sembrar y obtener un producto eficaz para venderlo.
Enfrenta desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es incrementar el negocio para poder producir aún más..

En los tiempos libres le gusta escuchar música cuando camina.
texts.en:
Clemencia Victoria is 43 years old.  She is a widow who lives with her children, who are 12 and 11, in the Ventanas Canton of the Los Rios Province.  

The members of the San José de los Amarillos Communal Bank meet at Amarillos, which is part of the Ventanas Canton.  This communal bank deals with short-cycle agricultural work, such as the planting of corn, rice, and pigeon peas.

Clemencia works in agriculture planting corn and rice.  She buys her products from Comercial Murillo and sells them in the same place.

She is asking for this loan to plant corn, rice, and pigeon peas and to buy supplies, fertilizers, urea, and farming fertilizer for the crops.  With the loan's help she has been able to treat her land and keep it in good condition to be able to plant and yield produce worthy of sale.

She deals with challenges such as plagues, diseases, and weather changes.  Her dream is to grow her business to be able to produce even more.

In her free time she likes to listen to music while going for walks.

loans.use: to plant corn, rice, and pigeon peas and to buy supplies, fertilizers, urea, and farming fertilizer for her crops

loans.name: Odalia Alexandra

texts.es:
Odalia Alexandra  tiene 23 años, Es soltera vive con los padres y el hijo de 10 meses de edad.

Los miembros de la V.R.C. SAN JOSE DE LOS AMARILLOS se dedican a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz y arroz.

Odalia se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz y arroz. 

Solicita el crédito para sembrar maíz, arroz y fréjol gandúl y poder comprar  semillas, insumos y fertilizantes, urea, abonos agrícolas para los cultivos.   Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. 
Enfrentar desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es ampliar la casa.

En los tiempos libres le gusta ver la televisión.
texts.en:
Odalia Alexandra is 23, a single mother, who lives with her parents and her 10 month-old son.

The members of San Jose de los Amarillos communal bank are short cycle corn and rice farmers.

Odalia farms corn and rice.

She is requesting this loan to plant corn, rice and pigeon peas and to buy seeds, agricultural supplies, fertilizer, urea and compost for her plants. Support from the loan would help her to meet her economic needs. She confronts challenges such as pest infestations, diseases and weather changes. Her dream is to enlarge her house.

In her free time, she enjoys watching television.

loans.use: to plant corn, rice, pigeon peas and to buy seeds, agricultural supplies and fertilizer, urea and compost for her plants.

loans.name: Vilma

texts.es:
Vilma es socia del  Banco Comunal “Central Vaquería”, ubicado en el distrito de Ilave, provincia El Collao, departamento de Puno, tiene 27 años de edad, es conviviente y tiene 1 hijo.  Vilma tiene estudios superiores (incompleto).
Trabaja con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desde hace un año, su primer préstamo fue por la suma de S/. 500.00 nuevo soles, préstamo  que invirtió en su negocio de compra  y venta de animales menores como ovinos y chanchos.  También se dedica a la venta de artículos artesanales, aunque no es su actividad principal.
Con éste nuevo préstamo de S/. 2,000.00 nuevo soles, comprará once animales para carnearlos y vender la carne en la ciudad de Arequipa  e Ilave.  La señora viaja cada semana debido a éste negocio, ella recibe la ayuda de su esposo.
La señora desea tener una casa en Puno y un carro para dar servicio de transporte.
Lo que le gusta del Banco Comunal son las charlas y las orientaciones que brindan.
texts.en:
Vilma is a member of the Communal Bank “Central Vaquería” (Central Dairy) which is located in the District of Ilave, El Collao Province, Department of Puno. She is 27 years old, in a common-law relationship, and has one child. Vilma did not complete her higher education.

She has worked with Manuela Ramos for one year. Her first loan was in the amount of 500 PEN and the money was invested in the purchase and sale of small animals, such as sheep and pigs. She also sells handmade articles, but this is not her main business.

With this new loan of 2000 PEN, Vilma will buy eleven animals for slaughter and then sell the meat in the cities of Arequipa and Ilave. She travels every week for her business and receives the support of her husband.

Sra. Vilma wants to have a house in Puno and a car for providing transportation services. What she likes about the Communal Bank are the discussions and the orientation classes that are provided.

loans.use: to purchase eleven animals for slaughter.

loans.name: Carmela

texts.es:
Carmela integrante del Banco comunal “Fondo Amigo” perteneciente a la localidad de Villa Alemana.
Se dedica al rubro del comercio desde hace 15 años, tiene un negocio de abarrotes, verduras y librería, éste se encuentra ubicado al lado de su casa.
Comenta que desde sus inicios le ha ido muy bien con el negocio, puesto que ha generado buenas ganancias que le han permitido remodelar la infraestructura de su vivienda y su almacén.
Su mercadería la compra en distribuidoras, supermercados mayoristas, en la feria y a los mismos proveedores quienes llegan a su domicilio.
Con el crédito comprará una máquina fotocopiadora para su librería.
Sus metas son abastecer su negocio de mercadería, ampliar su infraestructura y comprar computadores para formar un ciber pequeño, pero que sea un espacio útil para los estudiantes del sector. 
Carmela vive junto a su marido y sus tres hijos de 15, 12 y 4 años de edad, quienes estudian, todos van al colegio.
Sus sueños en el ámbito personal y familiar son comprarse un auto para trasladar su mercadería. 
Ella está muy agradecida del apoyo y confianza depositado en ella, por parte de Fondo Esperanza, ya que ha sido una gran ayuda para su vida y negocio. Ella asiste a las reuniones grupales del banco comunal, las cuales son muy gratas ya que comparte y disfruta con los demás socios. Comenta que es un grupo muy comprometido. 
Respecto a las capacitaciones, ha podido integrar estos aprendizajes de ventas a su propio negocio, ya que registra sus gastos e ingresos.
Viña del Mar es una ciudad y comuna ubicada en el litoral central de Chile, conocida como la Ciudad Jardín debido a los jardines y patios que poseen algunas viviendas antiguas de la ciudad. También es considerada la capital turística de Chile.
texts.en:
Carmela is a member of the Communal Bank “Fondo Amigo” which is located in the town of Villa Alemana. She has been in the retail trade for 15 years. Carmela manages a grocery store, a vegetable stand, and a bookstore which are all located next to her house. She says that since starting her business, she has done very well. Her business has enabled her to generate a good income that has helped her to remodel the infrastructure of her home and her store. The merchandise she sells is purchased from distributors, wholesale supermarkets, and at the fair. Those same distributors visit her at her home.

This loan will be used to buy a photocopying machine for her bookstore. Her goals are to restock her business with merchandise, expand the infrastructure, and buy computers so that she can start a small cybercafé in order to provide a useful space for the local students.

Carmela lives with her husband and three children (ages 15, 12, and 4) who are all studying and enrolled in school. Her personal ambitions and dreams for her family include buying a car so that she can transport her merchandise. She is very grateful for the support and trust that have been demonstrated to her by Fondo Esperanza, which has been a great help in both her life and in her business. Carmela attends the group meetings of her Communal Bank, where she freely shares with and enjoys the company of the other members. She says that they are a very committed group. With respect to the training, Carmela says that she has been able to integrate what she learned from her sales classes into her own business, such as how to track her income and expenses.

Viña del Mar is both a city and a township located on the central coast of Chile. It is known as “Ciudad Jardín” (Garden City) because of the gardens and patios found in some of the older homes in the city. Viña del Mar is also considered to be the tourist capital of Chile.

loans.use: to purchase a photocopying machine for her bookstore.

loans.name: Carlos

texts.es: El señor Carlos  es un cliente nuevo, vino por recomendación de Su padre que  es un cliente antiguo de la institución,  Carlos tiene como oficio el de técnico electricista el aprendió el oficio de su padre al igual que sus dos hijos desarrolla la misma actividad  hace mas de treinta años, Carlos  actualmente tiene un contrato con una empresa constructora en el centro de la ciudad, el todavía vive con sus Papas pero muy pronto se independizara y vivirá en la ciudad de el alto porque se compro una casita como terreno en la zona  de ventilla el destino del crédito será para la compra de material eléctrico como ser cables de toda medida y en grandes cantidades, enchufes y cajitas, es un joven trabajador con ganas de superación, agradecido con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
Sr. Carlos is a new client who came on the recommendation of his father, a longtime client of Emprender.  Carlos is an electrician and learned the trade from his father.  In addition, Carlos’ brother is also in the same line of work and all of them have been in this trade for more than 30 years.  Carlos currently has a contract with a construction firm in the central part of the city.  He still lives at home with his parents, but plans to become independent soon and move to the city of El Alto because he wants to buy a small house and some land in the District of Ventilla.  

This loan will be used to buy electrical supplies such as cables of all sizes and in large quantities, sockets, and electrical boxes.  Carlos is a hardworking young man who has the desire to succeed.  He is grateful to Emprender for the support it has provided.

loans.use: to buy electrical supplies.

loans.name: Balbina

texts.es:
Balbina es socia del  Banco Comunal “La Yunguyeñita”, ubicado en el distrito y provincia D. Yunguyo, departamento D. Puno, tiene 67 años D. edad, es viuda y tiene 8 hijos, todos independientes.  No cuenta con educación.
La señora trabaja con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desD. hace 5 años, su primer préstamo fue por la suma D. S/. 300.00 nuevo soles, dinero que invirtió en su negocio D. venta D. pan, mana (cereal), frutas y otros víveres.
Con éste nuevo préstamo D. S/. 300.00 nuevo soles, comprará frutas y mana  para su negocio, la señora venD. en un mercado D. la zonas  todos los jueves y domingos.  Ella trabaja sola en el negocio.
La señora desea mejorar su negocio es por ello que ve la forma D. tener variedad D. productos.
Lo que le gusta del Banco Comunal son las reuniones y la facilidad del préstamo.
texts.en:
Balbina is a member of the Communal Bank “La Yunguyeñita” which is located in the District and Province of Yunguyo, Department of Puno. She is 67 years old, widowed, and has eight children who are all independent. Balbina did not receive an education.

She has worked with Manuela Ramos for five years. Her first loan was in the amount of 300 PEN and the money was invested in her business of selling bread, “mana” (grain), fruit, and other food products.

With this new loan of 300 PEN, she will buy fruit and “mana” for her business. Sra. Balbina sells at a local market every Thursday and Sunday. She works alone in her business. Sra. Balbina wants to improve her business, which is why she wants to have a wider variety of products. What she enjoys about the Communal Bank are the meetings and the convenience of the loan.

loans.use: to buy fruit and grain.

loans.name: Feliciano

texts.es: Feliciano tiene 36 años, está casado con Victoria de 34 años y tienen 04 hijos que se encuentran en etapa escolar. Juntos residen en su propia morada, entre las verdes praderas de su centro poblado Santa Rosa. El trabajo al que se dedica es el de cultivar plantas oriundas de la zona selvática, como: cacao y café, frutos que tienen mayor demanda en el mercado y gracias a ello puede sostener a su familia. Tiene ya 25 años ejerciendo éste trabajo y hasta la fecha se ha convertido un hombre experto en la materia, pues le gusta lo que hace y del esfuerzo dado, ha logrado construir su casa a base de material noble. Para él la agricultura debe dedicarle el mayor tiempo posible, sin embargo necesita de la ayuda de jornaleros, quienes contrata para que se encargen de la cosecha y de trasladar los productos a los centros de acopio. Este será su tercer crédito con MFP, y explica que en sus anteriores créditos fue muy puntual en la devolución del dinero, por ello espera una vez más contar con su ayuda para seguir prosperando. Con los 2,000 nuevos soles comprará sacos de abono para fertilizar sus tierras.
texts.en:
Feliciano is 36 years old and married to Victoria, age 34. They have four children who are of school age. Feliciano and his family live in their own home among the green meadows in central Santa Rosa. His work involves cultivating plants that are native to the jungle region, such as cacao and coffee. These crops are in great demand at the market and enable him to sustain his family. Feliciano has 25 years of experience in this type of work and has become an expert in his field. He enjoys what he does and gives his full effort. Feliciano was able to build his home out of solid materials. For him, farming requires dedicating as much time as possible. However, he needs the help of workers that are hired to harvest and transport his products to the collection centers.

This will be his third loan with MFP. Feliciano explains that his previous loans were repaid very promptly. Once again, he hopes to receive assistance so that he can continue prospering. This loan of 2000 PEN will be used to buy sacks of compost so that he can fertilize his land.

loans.use: to purchase sacks of compost.

loans.name: Martin

texts.es: El sr. Martin nació en la ciudad de Potosí, actualmente radica en esta localidad de el torno en el barrio, se vino a esta localidad escapando de la sequia que sufrió en un época el norte de Potosí donde perdió todos sus sembradíos, ahora le va muy bien el se dedica a la construcción es albañil contratista,   cuenta con casa propia,  esta casado con la Sra. Rufina esposa la Sra. Rufina, ella  se dedica a la venta de pan, con tres hijos que  estudian y trabajan , han solicitado un crédito para la compra de  materiales de construcción,  es cliente antiguo y responsable por lo tanto nuevamente están muy agradecidos con la institución por el apoyo económico que les ha brindado  para mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Sr. Martin was born in the city of Potosí. He currently lives in a neighborhood in the town of El Torno. Martin moved to this town in order to escape the drought that ravaged northern Potosí, where he lost all of his crops. Now he is doing well in the construction sector as a bricklaying contractor. Martin has his own house. He is married to Sra. Rufina, who sells bread. They have three children who study and work.

Martin is requesting a loan to buy construction materials. He is a longtime client who is responsible. Once again, Martin is very grateful to Emprender for the support it has provided so that he can improve his quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials for his job as a bricklayer.

loans.name: Leonor

texts.es:
Leonor es socia del Banco Comunal Socos, tiene 46 años y 4 hijos, es socia D. FINCA Peru hace 3 años.
Leonor tiene un Molinera D. cereales, recuerda que con su primer crédito compró cereales, ahora con el préstamo que tiene también comprará mas cereales para moler, ahora su Molinera a crecido y esto es gracias a todo lo que pudo aprender en Finca y por el apoyo que le brindan, ella pudo hacer su casita, y educar a sus hijos, ahora su meta es poder agrandar su negocio.
texts.en:
Leonor is a member of the Communal Bank “Socos”. She is 46 years old and has four children. Leonor has been with FINCA Peru for three years.

She has a grain milling business. Leonor remembers that her first loan was used to buy grain. Now she will use this loan to also buy more grain for milling. Her business is currently growing as a result of everything she has learned from FINCA and the support it has provided. Leonor has been able to build her house and proviD. an education for her children. Now her goal is to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy grain in bulk for milling.

loans.name: Jesus Mario

texts.es: El sr. Jesús  nació en el departamentos  de  Chuquisaca, convive  con la Sra. Olga ella es ama de casa.  El se dedica a la agricultura, siembra maíz, yuca, maní y sandia .su domicilio esta ubicado en Betanzos a 32km de limoncito el Torno,  también cuenta con una parcela en Guapurucito al sur de Betanzos a 22 km, el destino del crédito es para mantenimiento de sus plantaciones de  sandia también para la siembra de maíz y yuca y todo lo que implica el preparado de la tierra. Todo lo que siembra lo vende directo al consumidor en el mercado el Torno.se siente muy agradecido con la institución por el apoyo que le ha brindado.
texts.en:
Sr. Jesús was born in the Department of Chuquisaca. He lives with Sra. Olga, who is a homemaker. Jesús is a farmer who grows corn, cassava, peanuts, and watermelons. His home is located in Betanzos, which is 32 km away from Limoncito in El Torno. Jesús also has a parcel of land in Guapurucito, which is 22 km to the south of Betanzos.

This loan will be used to maintain his watermelon crops, as well as for planting corn and cassava and everything that is required for preparing the land. All of his crops are sold directly to the consumer at the market in El Torno. Jesús is very grateful to Emprender for the support it has provided.

loans.use: to purchase supplies for maintaining his watermelon and corn crops.

loans.name: Norte Poty Group

texts.es:
El grupo Norte Poty es un comité de 19 mujeres que son muy bien organizadas, unidas, trabajadoras y solidarias unas con otras. Estas señoras son de la ciudad de Villarrica, y todas son vecinas y amigas. Se reúnen quincenalmente para brindarse apoyo y ayuda las unas a las otras. Estas señoras están muy animadas para seguir participando en este programa de microcrédito, pues han mejorando mucho sus ingresos económicos. Ademas de las actividades solidarias que tienen, en este grupo manifestaron que tienen un sueño de abrir una microempresa y que podrían trabajar juntas. Van a seguir esforzándose en esto, y tienen todas mucho ánimo de seguir creciendo en el futuro y de esa forma mejorar el nivel de vida de sus familias.
Una de las miembros es la señora Juana, ella se dedica a la lavandería, comenta que su trabajo es duro, pues diariamente recibe muchas prendas para lavar. Gracias a este trabajo ella ha podido sacar adelante a su familia y poder paliar los gastos que diariamente surgen en la casa.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de suavizantes, detergentes en polvo y demás insumos necesarios para la lavandería. Agradece a la Fundación por la oportunidad que esta le brinda.
texts.en:
The group “Norte Poty” is a committee of 19 women who are well-organized, united, hardworking, and supportive of one another. These women are from the city of Villarrica and are all friends and neighbors. They meet every 15 days in order to provide support and assistance to one another. These women are very excited about continuing their participation in this microcredit program so that they can greatly improve their income. In addition their group activities, the members say that they dream of opening a microenterprise and being able to work together. They continue to strive for this goal and have great excitement about continuing to grow in the future so that they can improve the standard of living for their families.

One of the members is Sra. Juana, who has a laundry business. She says that her work is hard because she receives many clothes to wash every day. Thanks to her work, Juana has been able to help her family move forward and to provide for the daily expenses incurred by her household. The loan she is requesting will be used to buy fabric softeners, powdered detergents, and additional supplies that are necessary for doing laundry. She is grateful to Fundación Paraguaya for the opportunity that has been given to her.

loans.use: to buy fabric softeners, powdered detergents, and additional laundry supplies.

loans.name: Ana De Jesus

texts.es:
Ana comenzó su negocio de chorizos para poderle ayudar a su sobrina con los estudios, luego de hacer varios ensayos en la producción de los chorizos encontró el chorizo con el sabor y el tamaño adecuado.

Sus chorizos ya son reconocidos en el sector, sin embargo ella quiere que su negocio crezca y poder vender así mas chorizos para continuar ayudándole a su sobrina con los estudios.

Ella se levanta muy temprano en la mañana para iniciar la preparación de los chorizos y así al día siguiente poderlos vender en los alrededores.
texts.en:
Ana started a chorizo sausage business so that she could help her niece with her studies. After making several trial runs of producing chorizo, she finally found the right flavor and size.

Her chorizo sausages have already received recognition in the area. However, she wants her business to grow and to increase her sales so that she can continue helping her niece with her studies.

Ana wakes up very early in the morning to begin preparing the chorizo so that she can sell them the following day in the surrounding areas.

loans.use: to purchase supplies for making chorizo sausages.

loans.name: Ana  Isabel

texts.es:
La clienta  Ana  Isabel es una mujer  de  55 años de edad, ella vive con su esposo , sus dos hijos y su mama que es una señora mayor y necesita cuidados .Doña Ana es una  trabajadora, responsable ,con grandes proyecciones en su vida y la de su familia, ella tiene un bazar en su casa de domicilio, le encanta superarse por eso está llevando un curso de computación . Es la segunda vez que nos solicita crédito en la Fundación en el primero mantuvo una buena moral de pago.
